rules_text:
{C}: Young Chief becomes a Human Hunter with base power and toughness 2/2.
{C}{C}: If Young Chief is a Hunter, put a vigilance counter on it and it becomes a Human Hunter Artificer with base power and toughness 4/4.
{C}{C}{C}: If Young Chief is an Artificer, you may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
